H0.text: Della Street was whose secretary. Erle Stanley Gardner

H1.text: Della Street was whose secretary. Raymond Burr

H2.text: Della Street was whose secretary. Clarence Darrow

H3.text: Della Street was whose secretary. Perry mason

A4.text: Della Street is the fictional secretary of Perry Mason in the long-running series of novels, short stories, films, and radio and television programs featuring the fictional defense attorney created by Erle Stanley Gardner.

A5.text: Gardner took this suggestion when he rewrote Reasonable Doubt as The Case of the Velvet Claws and made Della Street Perry Mason's secretary.
